channel.title: woke left on madsky
channel.description: Recent content in woke left on madsky

item.title: 12 Rules for Life
item.description: Jordan Peterson has become something of an anti-hero in modern woke culture, ostensibly through his refusal to bow to trans folks' demands to refer to them by a series of invented pronouns according to their preference.

item.title: Goodbye, Guardian
item.description: Mainstream media, primarily print media, has been very visibly struggling for a long time at the hands of the Internet. I’d written it off as an anachronism and for the most part celebrated the demise of trash journalism.
